buttons.I accept the Terms and Conditions and Pr: I accept the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.

introductionTexts.I can help you understand yourself: I can help you understand yourself
introductionTexts.This will only take a moment: This will only take a moment
introductionTexts.I help you strengthen your inner power,: I help you strengthen your inner power, better understand yourself, and discover ways of living that truly suit you.
Step by step, at your pace.
introductionTexts.Every moment you dedicate to yourself ma: Every moment you dedicate to yourself matters. Thanks to this, you get closer and closer to what you truly desire.
introductionTexts.Create an account to monitor your develo: Create an account to monitor your development and match the path to yourself. It will take you less than a minute.
introductionTexts.Choose the areas you want to discover fi: Choose the areas you want to discover first. Take into account your GROWWEB results - they may suggest where it is worth starting.
introductionTexts.All other topics will be waiting for you: All other topics will be waiting for you. You don't lose anything. :)
introductionTexts.We will start with the topics you have c: We will start with the topics you have chosen. MyGowi will guide you step by step.

loginTexts.Log in to continue your journey with Gow: Log in to continue your journey with Gowi.

createAccTexts.This will allow us to save your progress: This will allow us to save your progress and tailor your development path to you.

restorePasswordTexts.It happens to everyone! Provide your ema: It happens to everyone! Provide your email address and we will send you a link to set a new password.
restorePasswordTexts.In case of problems, write to us: suppor: In case of problems, write to us: support@mygowi.app
restorePasswordTexts.We have sent you a link: We have sent you a link
restorePasswordTexts.Check your email inbox. You will find a: Check your email inbox. You will find a link there to set a new password. If you don't see the message, also check the Spam or Offers folder.

errorMessages.You must accept the Terms and Conditions: You must accept the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.
You can request a new link in 5 minutes.

quizTexts.Now I will ask you a few short questions: Now I will ask you a few short questions to get to know you better.
quizTexts.My physical health allows me to do what: My physical health allows me to do what I want every day.
I feel calm and in mental balance.
quizTexts.I feel that my life has meaning and dire: I feel that my life has meaning and direction.
Overall, I am satisfied with my life.
quizTexts.I have pleasant and supportive social co: I have pleasant and supportive social contacts.
quizTexts.I am able to cope with daily duties and: I am able to cope with daily duties and challenges.
quizTexts.I return to balance after difficult situ: I return to balance after difficult situations.
quizTexts.I feel that I have good contact with mys: I feel that I have good contact with myself.
quizTexts.To what extent does this apply to you? (: To what extent does this apply to you? (0-5)

wellbeingProfile.Here is what your current state looks li: Here is what your current state looks like in various areas of life – GROWWEB.
wellbeingProfile.We have recorded this result for today –: We have recorded this result for today – you will return to it after a few weeks to see what has changed.

offert.Your path has already begun. If you want: Your path has already begun. If you want to go further, Gowi will be your daily companion. Unlock access to the full practice rhythm.
